quotes.title: Divine Message
quotes.subtitle: Timeless wisdom to guide your spiritual journey.
quotes.author: Swami Debananda Maharaj
quotes.q1: Service to living beings is service to God. When you serve the needy with a pure heart, you are worshipping the Divine.
quotes.q2: Peace is not found in the external world, but within. Silence the mind, and you will hear the voice of the soul.
quotes.q3: Love is the only force that can heal the world. Let your heart be a reservoir of compassion for all.
quotes.q4: Truth is the ultimate goal of all spiritual inquiry. Walk the path of honesty and integrity.
quotes.q5: Contentment is the greatest wealth one can possess. Be grateful for what you have.
quotes.q6: Forgiveness is a virtue that transcends all boundaries. Release the burden of anger and resentment.
quotes.q7: Meditation is the bridge between the self and the Divine. Practice daily to find your inner light.
quotes.q8: Humility is the foundation of all spiritual growth. Let go of the ego to embrace the truth.
quotes.q9: Wisdom comes to those who listen with an open heart. Every being has something to teach you.
quotes.q10: Compassion is the language that everyone understands. Be kind to every living soul.
quotes.q11: Devotion is the path that leads to liberation. Surrender your worries to the Divine.
quotes.discipline: Discipline is the key to mastering the mind. Through regular practice, greatness is achieved.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn about our spiritual lineage, our sacred space, and our mission to serve humanity.
about.maharaj_p1: Sadguru Swami Debananda Maharaj, a saint, seer and philosopher, had arrived in human society for the spiritual evolvement of mankind after spending years as an itinerant Naga sanyasin.
about.maharaj_p2: Initiated at the age of six by His revered Gurudev, Swami Gyanananda Maharaj, His Holiness had renounced His comfortable life in the heart of Kolkata with a faith that a life that is selfishly confined to a few people is not a life at all. Thus, with a determination to devote His entire life to the service of mankind, Swami Debananda Maharaj left His home at the age of seventeen, and embarked on the journey of an ascetic.
about.maharaj_p3: Thus, as a Naga Sanyasin, His Holiness, Swami Debananda Maharaj spent fifteen years travelling across India from one place to another until He arrived in a small village called Gowalpara in the Hooghly district of West Bengal. He stayed there for days and soon people started thronging about Him to seek His blessings. Eventually, He started discoursing in the evenings before an ever-increasing group of devotees. In no time a shelter was built and that became His first ashram, set up in 1989.
